title: The British Affair
description: Join Emma Perfect in London as she covers the Royal Wedding for a major American magazine! After being jilted on the eve of her wedding, Emma firmly believes that love is a fantasy and happily ever after for chumps and romantic losers. She might not be the best choice to write an article about a modern-day fairytale wedding!In true Halliday style, fate and a laughing universe have a hand in her adventure across the pond. Emma’s parents met at Charles and Di’s wedding and they’re convinced that their love-skeptical daughter will travel to London and finally – maybe – meet her knight in shining armor.Fireworks happen when Ms. Perfect meets a very British single dad named Jordyn Knight. The British Affair is a fun, sexy Halliday story with love, romance, fairytale weddings and happily ever after ~ guaranteed!
author: Suzanne Halliday
